title: 820-2850-A can't adjust the backlight
message: The backlight is always on 100%, we have changed the graphic chipset, frame buffer cap, Graphic power controller and backlight driver with no success, any ideas?

title: 820-2850-A can't adjust the backlight
message:
Try PRAM reset first.
Check PWM signal at U9701 (pin 2) when press backlight adjust keys.
DC scale good enough to see the variation.

title: 820-2850-A can't adjust the backlight
message:
PWM signal is present, but it doesnt vary.
It also doesnt show it in osx when i press one of the two keys.

title: 820-2850-A can't adjust the backlight
message:
Backlight is adjusted through GMUX (U9600).
Reflow it and change with one from donor board, if no result.

One thing, does this machine has EFI password?
